item.title: Potholes opened up again, 10th May

This road has only just been patched but now the potholes are open again. Please can you fix it properly.

item.title: Road breaking up on a tight bend, 10th May
item.description:
Road breaking up on a tight bend Which will cause an accident as cars are trying to go wider round the bend to avoid the pothole this will mean that they will hit oncoming traffic. Very dangerous please fix

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 83 Charlton Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: BLOCKED DRAIN ON A435 BISHOP’S CLEEVE BYPASS (another one), 10th May
item.description:
BLOCKED DRAIN ON A435 BISHOP’S CLEEVE BYPASS on same side as the entrance to The Grange / Capita carpark (northern entrance where the buses enter). . 2nd one is between the footpath exit to Kingsclere Drive & the entrance to the carpark of The Grange (the northern entrance where the buses enter).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A435, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain on a435 bishop’s cleeve bypass, 10th May
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 LITTLECOTE, Bishops Cleeve

item.title: Large deep potholes in line with passenger tyres., 9th May
item.description:

item.title: Direction Sign in Need of Repair. Hales Road, Cheltenham, 9th May
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 144b Hales Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Deep pothole outside 16 Albert Street, 7th May
item.description:
Deep pothole along the road outside 16 Albert Street. Roughly where someone would usually cycle or ride a motorbike so hazardous to these road users in particular, especially given the amount of people travelling through by car. The whole road could do with being resurfaced

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 12 Albert Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
